title: THESSALONIKI Natural AUTH: For "Nuclear Rififi" and SMEs for the SHE for SHE.
content:
Government propaganda justification of the ELAS repressive operation At the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki's sciences from the system's parrots, it reaches the levels of ridicule. After the huge size and a large number of police bodies (MAT, OPKE, EKAM, etc.) at a student party in the FAI organized as part of the occupations of student clubs, where (literally) people were caught with ... cocktails ... In the hands, with a total account of 49 arrested/affiliates, we now hear about the alleged "nuclear rifle" and "attack" on the nuclear reactor in the basement of the FROM that was supposedly according to "TA NEWS".

Within the FAI, as long as we are able to know, there are experimental provisions of a few millions of euros. Throughout student mobilizations, there has been no complaint or hint by the teachers of the School in relation to the integrity of the equipment. This in response to all the mud and the sprinkle that wants to rinse the 49 arrests.

Following the adoption of the Pierrakakis law, the revenge fury of the system will intensify and has already given significant writing samples. Mitsotakis himself threatens with discipline and deletions. Only the continuation of the struggles, the mass of procedures and the persistent in the direction of resistance to the education of the few and the chosen can set conditions for substantial response to fascist and overthrow of the law.
author: Σ.Μ.
